My Bio

Hello! I'm Umar Bashir Rather, a 26 year old passionate and self-taught web developer based in Pahalgam Kashmir.

I enjoy creating things that live on the internet like websites. My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences.

Here are some technologies I used:

  • HTML5 & CSS3
  • Bootstrap
  • Saas/Scss
  • JavaScript
  • PHP
  • WordPress
